ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Right and the other two predacons look at the downed bot. She slowly walks over and kicks the downed bot and watches the down bot move from the kick,

   Lady Right and the other two predacons look at the downed bot.  
She slowly walks over and kicks the downed bot and watches the down 
bot move from the kick, "Well It looks like he is out of it."     

   Lobstruck looks at the other predacons, "Carry Him to the lab."

   "WHY US!"  Yells Lepord, "Why Don't you?"

   "Cause I'm the sciencts."  Lobstruck says.

   Lady Right, not wanting to have these two preds to blow each other 
up walks over and grabs Thirst's legs, "Hey Lepord, come over here 
and help me with the body."

   "What Ever."  Lepord says as he comes over and grabs the head.  
The 3 Predacons walk off towards the lab.

   Lobstruck looks back at Void, "you can come if you want or you 
could go do whatever"
